documents.document: @armstrongrp1972 *I blush and scrunch my nose when you kiss it*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile softly and then look up at,you*
@armstrongrp1972 *I hold our son and smile*
@armstrongrp1972 mmhm. Yes he is
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile again* hi little baby boy *I kiss our sons head*
@armstrongrp1972 *I watch you and smile some as you pick John up*
@armstrongrp1972 *I look up at you when we finish and John cries*
@armstrongrp1972 *I chew on my lip and nod* okay then.
@armstrongrp1972 *i clean up the plates*
@armstrongrp1972 *i smile back at you some as I eat*
@armstrongrp1972 *I eat my waffles too* //lol. Yeah. ;)
@armstrongrp1972 /huh?/ *I smile a little and sit down in my seat*
@armstrongrp1972 good. *I smile happily and finish putting out yours and mine plates*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile up at you happily* I love you so much Babe.
@armstrongrp1972 *I check on the twins and then come to the kitchen and over to you and kiss your cheek*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile and then I go back to finish up cleaning*
@armstrongrp1972 oh. *I nod a little* I'm almost done cleaning the house up.
@armstrongrp1972 *I kiss you back and I smile* Hey why was I in the guest room? when I woke up...
@armstrongrp1972 Good morning babe *I smile some at you as I keep cleaning*
@armstrongrp1972 *I have the twins in their baby swing mobile thing as they sleep in it*
@armstrongrp1972 *In the morning I'm up taking care of both the twins and also cleaning up the house*
@armstrongrp1972 *Im not in our bed next to you. I'm sleeping in the guest bedroom under the covers on the bed*
@armstrongrp1972 *I go sleep in the guest room by accident because I'm so sleepy*
@armstrongrp1972 *I take care of the twins during the night*
@armstrongrp1972 *we both sleep*
@armstrongrp1972 *I sleep in our bed next to you when you lay down*
@armstrongrp1972 *I sleep as you carry me up to our room*
@armstrongrp1972 mmhm...Good babe. I love it to and I love you *I say as I keep my eyes closed, for me to try to fall asleep on the couch*
@armstrongrp1972 *I follow you so we can go cuddle on the couch*
@armstrongrp1972 *when I pull away I look up at you* Can we go cuddle? until I fall asleep..?
@armstrongrp1972 *I blush and now stand very close to you as we kiss*
@armstrongrp1972 *As soon as your done I kiss you*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile happily up at you*
@armstrongrp1972 *we both eat our dinner*
@armstrongrp1972 *I blush and I eat some of my food*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile at you* this looks delicious, thank you babe
@armstrongrp1972 *I come down to the kitchen and sit at the table*
@armstrongrp1972 *I go up and put the twins into their cribs*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile again and then you hand me John so you can go fix dinner*
@armstrongrp1972 And us too. *I look up at you*
@armstrongrp1972 they are identical twins, so yeah. Except that one is a boy and the other is a girl.
@armstrongrp1972 *I nod some and I finish off my snack soon*
@armstrongrp1972 Yes because they are newborn babies silly.
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile as I eat my snack and hold Samantha as she sleeps*
@armstrongrp1972 *I come back with my snack and I sit down next to you again*
@armstrongrp1972 *I get up with Samantha still in my arms and I go to the kitchen to get me a snack while she sleeps*
@armstrongrp1972 *After a few long minutes I pull away*
@armstrongrp1972 Alright *I kiss your cheek*
@armstrongrp1972 and our little girl. *I smile and watch the twins sleep some* What day do you go back to work?
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile happily and the twins fall back to sleep*
@armstrongrp1972 thank you. Our little family is so cute.
@armstrongrp1972 I think they do to *I kiss Samantha's head and then John's too*
@armstrongrp1972 *the twins both look at him from our arms*
@armstrongrp1972 *he barks some and lays down*
@armstrongrp1972 *he gets down when you push him gently*
@armstrongrp1972 *he barks still while he has his paws on your lap, and I watch him* I dont want him jumping up here...
@armstrongrp1972 *I hold Samantha as I sit next to you on the couch. Dumbo comes when he is called and he barks*
@armstrongrp1972 *I nod some* yes, just dont let Dumbo jump on them... *I follow you downstairs as I hold Samantha*
@armstrongrp1972 Its only a third of a bottle until they get a little bigger. *I then burp Samantha*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile softly and I feed Samantha her bottle*
@armstrongrp1972 *I cuddle you until the twins wake up again crying. We both go upstairs and I pick up Samantha and you pick John up*
@armstrongrp1972 *We cuddle more*
@armstrongrp1972 okay good *I smile again and kiss your nose*
@armstrongrp1972 Yeah, and keep me up at night too. But you will help some right? And you also start back to work soon.
@armstrongrp1972 Newborn babies sleep a lot at first. Maybe we can show him them when its time to feed them?
@armstrongrp1972 We can show the puppy them if dumbo is quiet...I dont want to wake the twins..
@armstrongrp1972 *I look up at you into your eyes* I love our little family.
@armstrongrp1972 *i nod in agreement and I smile again. I sit next to you*mmhm it is
@armstrongrp1972 okay. *I smile back and get up. I go over to the twins baby photo book, and I then bring the picture over to you*
@BabyBoyLuke__ @armstrongrp1972 + the hospital when they were first born three days ago.
@armstrongrp1972 yes we do. The only ones I have is when they were in my belly every month when my belly got bigger and the one we got at +
@armstrongrp1972 We should take the twins to a professional photographer for a few pictures.
@armstrongrp1972 *I snuggle back* I know what we all should do soon
@armstrongrp1972 *I blush and scrunch my nose up when you kiss it*
@armstrongrp1972 thank you *I smile up at you*
@armstrongrp1972 *we snuggle again and I smile*
@armstrongrp1972 I just did. I changed their diapers and fed them both their bottles..
@armstrongrp1972 good. *I nod some and kiss your cheek, I snuggle into you again*
@armstrongrp1972 *I look at the tv* who's winning?
@armstrongrp1972 *I come back down once I finish and I snuggle you again*
@armstrongrp1972 *I end up waking up a little later and I get up and kiss your cheek. I go check on the twins and change their diapers*
@armstrongrp1972 *I take a short nap while you watch the news. I stay snuggled up to you on the couch*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile again and I look at the tv*
@armstrongrp1972 mmhm...good *I smile and snuggle you. You turn on the tv to the news*
@armstrongrp1972 *I lay my head on your shoulder and I hold one of your hands and play with your fingers some* you make me happy
@armstrongrp1972 *You and me go downstairs and I put the baby monitor on the coffee table so we can be able to hear if the twins cry*
@armstrongrp1972 *I hug you back* Lets go downstairs? *I look up at you and then I make sure the baby monitors is turned on and charged up*
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile again* I love you too Babe lots
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile and look up at you*
@armstrongrp1972 *I do the same for John and i smile*
@armstrongrp1972 Okay yeah *I pick up John and I follow you up to their nursery that they share*
@armstrongrp1972 *I help get the twins carriers out with them in them. I smile* you both are home now.
@armstrongrp1972 *I smile and watch the twins sleep as you drive home from the hospital*
@armstrongrp1972 *I sit in the backseat in between their car carriers happily*
@armstrongrp1972 *After three days we can go home. I change the twins into their going home outfits as you go get the car carriers*
@iamhvlseyy *I shrug some* I don't know..anything is fine with me
@iamhvlseyy *I watch you sit down next to me criss crossed and I look around some before back at you again*
@iamhvlseyy *I smile some up at you and I now hold my empty juice box*
@iamhvlseyy yes you can *I end up hugging back and then pull away after a few minutes*
@iamhvlseyy your not stupid..*I shake my head and I then finish off my juice box* you can..
